abstract: GE Money Bank’s initial public offering would continue General Electric’s efforts to scale back on finance and focus on its industrial roots.
snippet: GE Money Bank’s initial public offering would continue General Electric’s efforts to scale back on finance and focus on its industrial roots.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — GE Money Bank, a unit of GE Capital in the Czech Republic, said on Monday that its initial public offering could value the banking business at 39.1 billion Czech korunas, or about $1.6 billion.

headline.main: I.P.O. Could Value GE Capital’s Czech Business at $1.6 Billion
